title: Update Shadow Payload Schema
description: Schema to validate the payload received for update shadow

clientToken.description: The unique identifier for the client making the update shadow request

state.description: The state node containing the desired, reported, and delta shadow state.

reported.description: The shadow document state reported by the components.

desired.description: The desired change in the shadow document state by the components.

delta.description: The difference between the desired and reported nodes.

version.description: The version of the shadow update request.
